title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description: We are seeking a Senior Frontend Engineer to join our growing team. You'll work on building beautiful, performant user interfaces using React and modern web technologies.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with React and modern JavaScript
Strong understanding of responsive design and mobile-first development
Experience with state management (Redux, Context API)
Proficiency in CSS/Sass and modern styling solutions

title: Product Manager
description: Join us as a Product Manager to drive product strategy and execution. You'll work closely with engineering, design, and business teams to deliver world-class products.
requirements: Strong analytical and data-driven decision making

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer to build and maintain our cloud infrastructure. You'll work with cutting-edge technologies and help scale our platform.
requirements: Knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)

title: UX/UI Designer
description: We're looking for a talented UX/UI Designer to create exceptional user experiences. You'll be responsible for the entire design process from research to final implementation.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Strong portfolio showcasing web and mobile designs

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data science team to build ML models and extract insights from large datasets. You'll work on challenging problems across various domains.
requirements: MS/PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
Proficiency in Python (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow)

title: Enterprise Sales Executive
description: We're seeking an ambitious Enterprise Sales Executive to drive revenue growth. You'll manage the full sales cycle for enterprise clients.
requirements: 5+ years of B2B enterprise sales experience
Proven track record of meeting/exceeding quotas
